page.title: 15My mother Gwladys
page.content: My mother Gwladys Finlinson gets up in a morning and puts the baits up.She makes sandwiches and soup.Dad goes to work and then mother goes.My mother works in the Naafi at Warcop camp.She works very hard until 2.30pm. She comes home and makes tea ready for dad and me to come home to. At night she falls asleep.Same with dad sometimes. I help make tea if I am home in time. After tea I clear the tea table and go out. I leave mother and dad to do jigsaw puzzles, crosswords, and watch television.When I come back in I watch television and then go to bed if I am in late in and mother goes mad. Then they watch T.V and at about 11 o'clock they go to bed.
